casebody.data:
SMITH v. WARDEN OF MARYLAND PENITENTIARY [App. No. 30,

September Term, 1961.]

Decided October 19, 1961.

Before Hbndbrson, Hammond, Hornby, Marbury and Sybbrt, JJ.

PBR Curiam.

The application for leave to appeal from a denial of post conviction relief is denied for the reasons set out in the opinion of the court below.
